amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to hardrock mineral royalty and fee reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 483 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 483 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall NM. (consideration: CR S2288-2289; text: CR S2288-2289) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to hardrock mineral royalty and fee reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 483 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 483 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Udall NM.
